comment.author: 28853714@N05
comment._content: Are those photo cubes with pictures of the toys that are inside the store, or just stacked toy blocks?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Many of those photos are of horses, which were unlikely to be for sale in a department store. It looks like the window dressers decorated blocks (or pasteboard cartons?) with images from chromolithographs.
